elements.name: User verify all items are present in Desktops tab

steps.name: User click on Show all desktops
User should see all items are present in Desktop page

comments.value: #Scenario: User add HP LP 3065  from Desktops tab to the cart

steps.name: User click add to Cart button
User should see a message ‘Success: you have added HP LP 3065 to your Shopping cart!’

comments.value: #Scenario: User add Canon EOS 5D from Desktops tab to the cart

steps.name: User click ADD TO CART option on ‘Canon EOS 5D’ item
User click add to Cart button
User should see a message ‘Success: You have added Canon EOS 5D to your shopping cart!
